metadata.title: C&C Weapons: Renegade Edition
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex additional credit: Vertaalfout, R4V3-0N, Alder
metadata.description:
This mod adds several weapons from the Command and Conquer universe to Multiverse. Requires the latest versions of the Tiberian Sun Ship Pack and Vertex Tags and Utility Functions. It must be patched after its dependencies, so the load order should look something like this:
| Multiverse | ... | Vertex Tags and Utility Functions | Tiberian Sun Ship Pack | C&C Weapons: Renegade Edition V ...
